subproject.description:
Output 1: ANDMA and Key ministries disaster management Professional/Organisational Capacity built.
Output 2:Natural Disaster preparedness and response Capacity strengthened at government institutional and community level.
Output 3: Disaster Risk Information Management system established and strengthened in Afghanistan.
Output 4: Disaster Response Systems developed in Afghanistan
subproject.title: Comprehensive Disaster Risk Re

subproject.description:
Activity/Output 1:
 - There is no relief administration system in place. 
- ANDMA is lacking the required capacity to lead NGOs and provide technical support on DRM to line ministries and other stakeholders.  

Activity/Output 2:
 - Only 6 provinces have provincial disaster management plans and trained teams of PDMP master trainers. 
- Communities are highly vulnerable due to lack of required capacities among community members to cope with disasters. 
- Vulnerability assessment is conducted in 6 provinces by CDRRP and UNAMA has conducted vulnerability assessment of some southeast provinces only.
subproject.title: Nationl Disastr. Mgmt. Project
